item.title: Sunrise Design
item.description: Web Studio in Baltimore, Maryland. http://sunrisedesign.com/

item.title: Big Cartel
item.description: Shopping cart provider Big Cartel hosts simple, customizable ecommerce sites for independent creatives, e.g. artists and musicians. The company site sells the product by describing the service in terms of value, and by providing examples of other artist sites, and the design experience. I think the soft textured watercolor background in the header gives it a hand-crafted feel that’s appropriate to this audience. I think emphasizing the sign up link slightly might be a good idea.

item.title: Volkswagen Lifestyle Vehicles (UK)
item.description: Love the soft texture of the water color background and the animated illustration that appears when you hover over the vehicles. http://www.volkswagen-vans.co.uk/escape/
